channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overgrown tree impeding the path, 20th July
item.description:
The stepless access path next to the canal is severely impeded by an overgrown tree. The branches are drooping to around 3ft off the ground and is causing issues for those using the ramp.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12-16, Cookham Crescent, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 metre long pothole where previous repairs have failed, 20th July
item.description:
3 metre long pothole where previous repairs have failed This is probably 4th or 5th time I’ve reported pothole(s) in this exact spot. Rather than doing yet another temporary fix that will fail in just a few months, how about doing a proper road repair. And one that recognises need to reinforce the road surface by the bus stop, otherwise I’ll just be reporting another pothole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 167c, Stroud Green Road, Stroud Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Full of non residents, 20th July
item.description:
Sudden influx of cars in this car park since the gate is broken and is constantly left open. Multiple cars are not resident and this car park is now treated like a free public car park. Either fix the gate or enforce permits in this car park
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Watson Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Wenlock rd., 20th July
item.description:
There is constant fly tipping here and no attempt to stop it. No sign or cctv camera. The pavement is often impassible with household waste - mattresses, white goods etc. Please can something be done to stop it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wenlock Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road sweeper required Nutbourne Street and Third Avenue W10, 20th July
item.description:
A lady at number 25 Nutbourne Street has cut a neighbours hedge and left it all over the pavement. Can we have this swept up. Ta!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Nutbourne Street, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose paving slab, 20th July
item.description:
Paving slab is loose and is dipping and wobbly. This has caused a dip which is now a trip hazard. Looks worse than it is in the photo on here. Been there for around a week .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Keverne Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flagstone around tree is dislodged. Tree damaged, 20th July
item.description:
On the pavement outside 25 Richmond Road E83BF, dislodged flagstone around tree. Issue reported last week and now worse. The flagstone has been further dislodged and is a trip hazard. The tree itself is now damaged. Please save the tree.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping--dressing mirror, pram, bags of rubbish, 20th July
item.description:
Please collect the dressing mirror, bags of rubbish and child's pram left outside 2a Lawrence Buildings, at junction of Lawrence Buildings and Garnham Street. Thank you.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Garnham Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 20 Acol Road Eucalyptus Tree, 20th July
item.description:
This tree has grown too large and is now touching the building. It’s blocking some of the daylight for ground floor and first floor apartments. It sways strongly in the wind sometimes looks like it could snap in half.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Acol Road, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
